actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the depreciation adjustments required in computing alternative minimum taxable income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal provisions requiring adjustments to depreciation in calculating alternative minimum taxable income. Eliminates certain accelerated depreciation as an item of tax preference for purposes of the alternative minimum tax.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the depreciation adjustments required in computing alternative minimum taxable income.
